name: The Spice of Life
description: Sometimes a bit of spice in a cocktail is just the right thing to remind you that you're still alive. Here's a simple drink that can be adjusted to suit both those who crave heat, and those who like it a bit more mild. It's dynamite with tequila, but you can also make a smoky version with mezcal or a more herbal version with gin.
recipeIngredient: 2 drops Sriracha, or more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Muddle strawberry, cilantro, and two cucumber slices. Add lime juice, agave nectar, amaro, tequila, and Sriracha. Fill shaker with ice.
Shake vigorously and double-strain into an ice-filled rocks glass. Garnish with remaining cucumber slices.
